annotation.spannedText: This is the official advice of “the establishment” to you

classMention.mentionClass: This is the official advice of “the establishment” to you

annotation.spannedText: These have all increased severely in the past 25 years

classMention.mentionClass: These have all increased severely in the past 25 years

annotation.spannedText: do see the movie, and act

classMention.mentionClass: do see the movie, and act

annotation.spannedText: Act to protect the health of your children and your grandchildren

classMention.mentionClass: Act to protect the health of your children and your grandchildren

annotation.spannedText: We need a reassessment of vaccine safety

classMention.mentionClass: We need a reassessment of vaccine safety

annotation.spannedText: The evidence is that our current program is not safe

classMention.mentionClass: The evidence is that our current program is not safe

annotation.spannedText: Millions of parents in the US are asking their pediatricians if immunizations are safe, and their pediatricians are reassuring them based on fraudulent data

classMention.mentionClass: Millions of parents in the US are asking their pediatricians if immunizations are safe, and their pediatricians are reassuring them based on fraudulent data

annotation.spannedText: Vaccines are not the problem; the problem is lack of good science, with evidence of fraud at the highest levels

classMention.mentionClass: Vaccines are not the problem; the problem is lack of good science, with evidence of fraud at the highest levels

annotation.spannedText: If we are to restore the trust of our people in vaccine safety, good science must be done, with rigor and transparency

classMention.mentionClass: If we are to restore the trust of our people in vaccine safety, good science must be done, with rigor and transparency
